<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/plan/queryusersbyplan/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Obtiene la lista de usuarios (compañías) que tienen asignado un plan específico.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"id","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"ID del plan","example":"1"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Lista de usuarios recuperada exitosamente","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
